### Europe Summer 2017 Trip

#### Countries visited Switzerland, Italy, Montenegro, Greece, Croatia

##### Day 1 

* As hurricane harvey was approaching US the trip was in serious doubt. But luckily the planes left before the hurricane made landfall.
* Next day landed in Zurich
* Took the train from Zurich to Bern, Bern to Interlaken, Interlaken to Grindelwald
* Reached [Grindlewald hotel](https://img.myswitzerland.com/mys/n49452/images/buehne/aussenansicht_kreuz__post.jpg) around 4 pm
* Had pizza for greasy pizza for dinner, then had a relaxing evening while a band played American country music


##### Day 2

* Took the [gondola](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JWHmG99jlwU) up to [First Cliff Walk](https://media.jungfrau.ch/image/upload/f_auto,fl_lossy,q_auto,c_crop,ar_1680:700/c_scale,w_1320/v1479810701/fileadmin/Grindelwald_First_Sommer/Grindelwald-First-Sommer-Cliff-Walk-Eiger-Moench-Jungfrau.jpg), and enjoyed som amazing views of the Alps
* Then hiked to a nearby [lake Bachalpsee](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bachalpsee#/media/File:Bachalpsee_reflection.jpg) and took some more pictures of the peaks in reflecting water.
* After the gondola and hike everybody was hungry and craving for some good food and [Golden India restaurant](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Golden+India/@46.6244728,7.9753073,12z/data=!4m8!1m2!2m1!1sGolden+India!3m4!1s0x478f9bf95116ebdd:0x6499491bcf71838!8m2!3d46.6244583!4d8.0430548) fulfilled all the cravings.
* After dinner enjoyed some [mini golf](https://www.google.com/maps/search/mini+golf/@46.6232805,8.0389147,19.66z) as sunset behind [Mount Eiger](https://img.myswitzerland.com/mys/n13929/images/buehne/Eiger_nordwand-1.jpg)


##### Day 3

* After enjoying made to order omlette and muslifor breakfast, we left for Lauterbrunnen
* From there took the bus to Stechelberg and four different Gondolas to reach Schilthorn
* We passed small villages of Wengen, Gimmewald and Murren as we travelled
* The final destination for the gondola was [Piz Gloria revolving restaurant](https://img.myswitzerland.com/mys/n65937/images/buehne/piz_gloria_muerren.jpg)
This restaurant was featured in [007 movie](http://jamesbond.wikia.com/wiki/Piz_Gloria) and offered spectacular views of all the major Alps peaks

* The [Lauterbrunnen Valley](https://img.myswitzerland.com/mys/n65934/images/buehne/st0042708_wilderswil_lauterbrunnental.jpg) offered incredible views of the mountains and has 72 waterfalls.
